comments:
Build 20040406 + fresh workspace

Trying to open the update manager in help menu:

Unhandled Exception
Reason:
Unable to execute early startup code for a startup extension in plugin 
org.eclipse.update.scheduler
Unhandled event loop exception
Reason:
org/eclipse/update/operations/IOperationListener

At what point did you see this error?
There has been a recent change in the automatic startup code for update, but 
things seem to work fine on mu 0406 installation.
Can you provide the exact steps to reproduce the problem? Thanks

I expanded SDK, and launched it on new workspace 'workspace' located as a 
sibling of eclipse install folder.

With -consoleLog open, I got the following output:
